page.title: 13A45 TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content:
Survey carried out June 17th 11.20 to 11.50. on the A45 Coventry bypass linking S.Birmingham to the M1.
Northbound: 195 cars, 71 lorries, 2 motorbikes, 42 vans, 1 bicycle, 1 coach, 3 others; TOTAL 315.
Southbound: 175 cars, 40 lorries, 2 motorbikes, 45 vans, 5 coaches, 1 other; TOTAL 268.
We consider the count to be made at a period of average useage which would be balanced by higher numbers during peak periods and lower numbers during the night. We therefore estimate that on a normal weekday 583x48=27 984 vehicles would use this road.
